title: [Small House, Living Room]
description: The heat from the great fire must have been very intense here, for the structure that remains is little more than a burned out shell now.  Moonlight pours through gaping cracks in the walls and ceiling, illuminating the dust particles that fly into the air with each movement.

The heat from the great fire must have been very intense here, for the structure that remains is little more than a burned out shell now.  Light pours through gaping cracks in the walls and ceiling, illuminating the dust particles that fly into the air with each movement.
